short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension to review the on-page SEO attributes of a page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Elevate your website's SEO performance with the SEO On-Page Analyzer Chrome extension, a comprehensive tool designed to help SEO practitioners with quick webpage analysis.

Features include:

🔍 Complete On-Page Analysis: Dive into the essentials of SEO with evaluations covering title tags, header tags, links, images, stylesheets, scripts, meta tags, word counts, and more, ensuring every aspect of your page is optimized for search engines.

💾 Export to Excel: Seamlessly export analyzed data to Excel for detailed analysis and streamlined reporting, making it easier to identify areas for improvement and track your optimization efforts over time.

🔗 Link Tester: Within the "Links", "Images", and "Styles & Scripts" sections, utilize the link testing feature to verify all links, ensuring there are no non-200 status code responses. This aids in debugging and optimizing your web pages for better performance and user experience.

👩‍💻 User-Friendly Interface: With an intuitive interface designed for both beginners and seasoned SEO professionals, navigating through the extension’s features and utilizing its capabilities has never been easier.
